description: Try our easy to follow Chili Pork Ribs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chili Pork Ribs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put all the ingredients except the pork in a mini food processor or blender and blend until smooth. Pierce the meat of the ribs a few times with a sharp knife, then place in a shallow dish. Rub over the marinade, cover with plastic wrap, and leave to marinate in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours and preferably overnight.
Remove about 3 tablespoons of the marinade and reserve. Wrap the ribs in a double layer of foil and place on a baking sheet. Bake in a preheated oven, 148°C, for 1 1/2 hours.

Remove the foil and baste all over the ribs with the reserved marinade. Heat a barbecue or ridged grill pan until smoking hot, add the ribs and cook for 3-5 minutes on each side, until charred all over.
